overview: Washington Redskins Super Bowl victories, including Super Bowl XVII, when the Redskins defeated the Miami Dolphins and MVP running back John Riggins set the record for most rushing yards in a Super Bowl. These original television broadcasts also include Super Bowl XXII, when Washington took on the Denver Broncos, and Super Bowl XXVI, when the Redskins faced the Buffalo Bills.
title: Washington Redskins Super bowls
